dict.acceptation: 在一定程度上；部分地；不完全地；半；

sent.orig: Technical analysis is partly a science and partly an art-partly objective and partly subjective.
sent.trans: 技术分析一部分是科学，一部分是艺术——部分主观，部分客观。

sent.orig: Accordingly the world which Christianity emerged was partly Semitic and Jewish, partly Roman, and partly Hellenistic.
sent.trans: 因此基督教出现的世界，一部分是闪族和犹太族的，一部分是罗马的，一部分是希腊文化的。

sent.orig: He read partly for information, partly for comparison, partly for insight.
sent.trans: 他读书一部分是为了获得知识，一部分是为了作出比较，一部分是为了增长见识。

sent.orig: Gerund is used partly as a noun, partly as a verb.
sent.trans: 动名词部分当作名词，部分当作动词。

sent.orig: She was on the twitters, partly of expectation, and partly of fear.
sent.trans: 她紧张得要命，一半是由于期待，一半是由于恐惧。
